data.text: @ireviprajapati Mr Prajapati, we believe our team connected with you to address your concern and request you to connect with the concerned travel agency for further clarification on the same. ~Yashica
@swarn786 Mr Mukherjee, we request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same and advise. Thanks. ~Navi

urls.title: COVID-19 state-wise regulations | IndiGo
urls.description: Find all essential information on COVID-19 state-wise regulations and know more about different state governments that have laid out their respective protocols for passengers arriving at their airports.

data.text: @arup_majumder Mr Majumder, we request you to visit https://t.co/4GKQuRRzy2 to check on the State Wise Covid Guidelines. Thanks. ~Navi
@arup_majumder Sir, your son will not be required to carry the RTPCR test for traveling. ~Yashica

@TheSkandar Mr Shah, thank you for taking the time to speak with us tonight. While we truly regret the untoward experience, we'd like to assure you that this is being taken up and investigated on top priority. We shall connect with you again after a diligent investigation. ~Navi
@SRIKANT61937069 Mr Mahapatra, we are here and request you to DM us your concern(s) in detail along with your Contact Number, so we may check. Thanks. ~Navi
@rohitparab9 Hi, we are here to assist and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@Hala2303 Hi, we request you to share your contact details with us over DM so we can assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@RENGANATHANVEN4 Sir, we request you to DM us the PNR along with the transaction id so we can get this checked and assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @eshitasolanki Ms Solanki, we regret the inconvenience caused and request you to kindly share your contact number with us over DM so we can highlight this to our team. Meanwhile, please use https://t.co/9SNoD81Yl6 link to complete your web check-in. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@BG1917 Hi, we regret the experience and request you to DM us the PNRs and your Contact Number, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi
@notyourmooo Hi, we request you to DM us your experience so we may check on the same and assist. Alternatively, you may also share your feedback at customer.relations@goindigo.in. ~Navi

@travelshreya Ma'am, we request you to share a screenshot of the error with us over DM so we can raise this with our team. Meanwhile, please share your PNR and working contact number so we can assist you over a call. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@amarprabhu417 Sir, we are looking into this immediately and request your patience during this interim. Please allow us some time to update you. ~Yashica

urls.title: Change your flight in easy steps - IndiGo
urls.description: Change your IndiGo flight with the step by step guide to flight change. Know the flight change charges for domestic and international bookings, at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @kumar_akash1011 Mr Kumar, we request you to visit https://t.co/3wcEEcDh36 link to proceed with your rescheduling. ~Yashica

@ravalja20890431 Hi, you can surely carry the milk powder and medicines with you, however, we would suggest you to carry them in your check-in luggage. In case there is a medication you need to take during the flight, you may carry that limited dosage only in your hand luggage. ~Yashica
@Chandan_K_ Hi, customers are allowed to carry up to 2 litres of properly packed Ghee in their Check-In Baggage. We hope this clarifies. ~Navi
@k_rinkle Hi, we request you to share your contact number and PNR with us over DM so we can assist you over a call. ~Yashica   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@dhawan_dawn Hi, we regret the inconvenience and would like to look into this. Please DM us your PNR for the same so we may check. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@rinkeshind Certainly, Sir. We are here to assist you. Could you DM us your PNR along with the supporting medical documents duly signed and stamped by the treating doctor so we may assist you in a better way? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sumangaurav2009 Hi, we regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us the PNR and your Contact Number so we may connect with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@0055DD Mr Dalal, this looks concerning and we would like to look into this matter at the earliest. Unprofessionalism is completely unacceptable at IndiGo. We request you to DM us the PNR details so we can assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@kun_bhambhani Sir, we regret the experience and are checking on this with our Airport Team. Please allow us some time for the same and you may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi

@skanda1515 Sir, we understand the discomfort and do our best to maintain a pleasant temperature on-board. Our Air conditioning is powered by the plane's engine. As soon as the flight takes off, AC kicks in. However, we'll surely share your feedback with the concerned team. ~Yashica
@Sanchit26091999 Sir, flight fares are ever-changing and subject to increasing or decreasing at any given time. We look forward to your understanding of the same. ~Yashica
@sumit_neogi Mr Neogi, we regret the experience you had and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may check on the same and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@stronger_ayaz Mr Khan, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can check and confirm. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@iPrashantGautam Mr Gautam, we are concerned to note this and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may look into this. We wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @Tayal_Malvika Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience and request you to visit Plan B : https://t.co/YiTMpABK3W to opt for an Alternate Flight/ Full Refund. Please DM us your PNR and Contact Number in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Tayal_Malvika Ms Tayal, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can get this checked and assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@sanket_golechha Mr Golechha, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may have this shared with our Concerned Team for further review and rectification. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@kevin4potus Hi, unfortunately, sector change isn't allowed in a confirmed booking. We request your understanding on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@Kajalj1894 Ma'am, we believe our Customer Experience Team is already assisting you in regards to your raised concern. They'll get back to you ASAP and we request your patience on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@bluorangedragon Ma'am, we regret to note this and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may check and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@sanjay123456 Mr Jha, Check-In at the Airport is not chargeable, and you may contact our Airport Team for assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@maverik_nishant Mr Kumar, we regret the experience and will surely check on this with our concerned Airport Team. Your feedback is duly noted and we wish to serve you in a better way, onboard our flight. ~Navi
@khantauqeer143 Mr Khan, you are allowed to carry up to 5 litres of Zam Zam Water in your Check-In Luggage. We hope this helps. ~Navi

data.text: @ritesh1105 Mr Srivastava, we regret the experience you had and believe that our Airport Team assisted you with Alternate Flights. We'll have your feedback shared with the Concerned Team and look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@ahmedaljabri944 Sir, we regret the inconvenience and are checking on this with our Concerned Team. Please allow us some time and you may also DM us for further communication on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@charisma_saraff Dear Ms Saraff, we completely understand the issue. As communicated by our Customer Experience Team, we are getting this checked on priority and shall get back to you with the relevant information. Thanks! ~Yashica
@GauravP89362839 Hi, we regret the experience you had and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@AdamyaVikrant We regret the delayed response, we believe one of our team member got connected and assisted you with your concern. ~Diyashi

@RajeevM1951 Mr Majumdar, please allow us some time to check on this and we'll get back to you ASAP. You may also DM us your Contact Number for us to get in touch with you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@rajeshsarrin Thanks for the #Shoutout, Mr Sarin. Our Airport Team is always there to assist you and we'll have your feedback shared with Ms Sharma to make her day. Wishing you all a comfortable time onboard our flight. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@ANJOYNIRALA We regret the delayed response sir. We believe one of our team member called and assisted you with the baggage information. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@DebpriyoDey We regret to see this, Mr Dey. We have already shared the  matter with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@advsunilbansal1 Mr Bansal, we regret to note your experience and are looking into this. Meanwhile, we request you to also share a copy of the PIR (Property Irregularity Report) issued by the arrival airport with us over DM. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@missmanasi Hi, we would like to look into this and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number, so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@iamangangwar We are glad to know that our Content Team kept you entertained on-board and we hope you had a great time flying with us. 💙 ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo

@dogmatic_theist We regret the delayed response and the inconvenience caused. Please check the DM for our reply. ~Diyashi

#6EWingView

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @arjun_pratap_ Sir, we never wish our passengers to go through any hassle. You may click on the Plan B link here https://t.co/2OUXTgJRNo to book an alternate flight with us or cancel at no charge. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. ~Ojasvi

@RUPALIDEAN Ms Dean, this is not the service we intend to provide to our customers. Your feedback is extremely valuable for us to improve our customer's experience. We will surely raise this with the concerned time for further review. We wish to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@ChandanVerma21 Mr Verma, we believe your concern has been addressed. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

data.text: @motwani_jaymit Mr Motwani, all customers traveling with a single name on passports on a residence/employment visa shall be allowed to travel. However, all customers traveling with a single name on their passports on a tourist/visit or any other visa shall not be allowed. ~Ojasvi
@Shiv35277040 We regret the delayed response. We believe your concern has been resolved. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@SandypkcSandeep Sir, this is not the experience we intend to provide. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can highlight this with the concerned team. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@DeepakGarg65 Mr Garg, we regret the delayed response. We have replied you in DM, we request you to check the same. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@MDKhaleq Sir, we request you to share your PNR along with the first page of your Passport via DM  so we can check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@prtik0406 Sir, we have replied to you, please check your DM . ~Diyashi
@billionhunter Hi, we are concerned to know this. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can raise this with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi
@ymwadekar Thank you for sharing the PNR, sir. We have share the appreciation. Hoping to se you on board soon. ~Diyashi
@nitesh_gg We regret the delayed response. We have note the concern and shall try to provide you with an better experience in future. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Track Refund Status
urls.description: Adult(s) (> 12 years) Book extra seat(s) for less and travel with more space, comfort & 10 kg extra baggage allowance. Citizens of Nepal and Maldives are eligible for tax exemption/reduction, as per applicable laws, on the airfare. In order to avail such tax exemption/reduction, passengers must declare their correct nationality at the time of booking. In case citizens of Ne pal or Maldives intend to travel with any foreign nationals, such citizen (passenger) are requested to kindly book tickets for

data.text: @AshishShukla72 Sir, we regret the delayed response. As checked, partial refund has been initiated from our end to the primary mode of payment. You may check the same by visiting https://t.co/rvqaDwpvyF . You may get it touch with your travel agent for further assistance. ~Diyashi
@joshidaniel Sir, you may carry them in the check-in baggage. ~Ojasvi

@IndiGo6E Sir, we never wish to disrupt the plans of our customers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. We hope you will understand that many factors are beyond our control that determines our flight schedule. ~Ojasvi
@jagriti_kedia Hi, we regret the experience and will surely check on the same with our concerned team. We request you to share your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Shekhar07091990 We regret the inconvenience caused sir. We are getting the issue checked on priority. Allow us some time to get back with an update. ~Diyashi
@nilamni125 We regret the delayed response sir. We have replied to you. Please check your DM. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@npyadavcimap Sir, we are concerned to know this. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@BeastVeeru We regret the delayed response, sir. We have replied to you , please check you DM for the same. ~Diyashi

@Haseeb46355916 Sir, thank you for your warm words. We're glad to hear our team assisted you well. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll pass your kudos to the concerned team. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@GirishPadhi Mr Padhi, we regret the delayed response. Please check your DM, we have replied you. ~Diyashi
@Adhavan48210733 Mr Fernandez, we are constantly expanding our networks and adding new routes. Your feedback will be shared. Stay tuned
@SamarPansari Mr Pansari, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and get back to you with an update.  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@IndiGo6E Mr Shengale, our team tried to reach out to you, however, couldn't. Please help us with an alternate contact number and a suitable time to talk via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@SevakDevanshi Hello, we are happy to serve you. Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi

@harryshelke Sir, we believe the concerned team is in contact with you. Further, we tried connecting with you, however, couldn't establish a signal. Please help us with an alternate contact number along with a suitable time to talk via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@xashtug We truly regret the discomfort you had with us. We wish to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi (2/2)

@xashtug Sir, we understand your disappointment. Since your flight was changed, the same seat was not available on the new flight, hence our Kolkata team assigned you the seat as per the availability. (1/2)/
Aye, aye, Captain! #goIndiGo https://t.co/JIJeNokydg
@VedVriti Ma'am, you may carry it in your check-in baggage only. ~Ojasvi
@pankajc79229214 We, understand your disappointment. We have duly noted your concern. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@sachinsraghavan Mr Raghavan, we regret the delayed response. We believe that the baggage has been received by you. Thank you. ~Diyashi

@ravikiransvs Sir, please allow some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Ojasvi
